onConnectedToSgWs.description: Triggered when connected to the signalling.

onLoggedInToSgWs.description: Triggered when logged in to the signalling.

onJoinedRoom.description: Triggered when successfully joined a room.

onPeerMessage.description: Triggered when a message is received.

isHost.description: Returns true if the client tag is host.

onPeerConnected.description: Triggered on peer connected to host.

onDisconnectedFromSignalling.description: Triggered on disconnected from signalling server

onPeerDisconnected.description: Triggered when peer disconnect (either from host or a peer leaving the host).

isConnected.description: True if connected to a signalling server

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

isLoggedIn.description: True if logged in to a signalling server

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

onLeftRoom.description: On left room on signalling server

onKicked.description: Triggered when kicked from a room

isInRoom.description: Returns true if the client tag is in a room.

onError.description: Triggered if an error occurs with the signalling server. The ErrorMessage expression indicates the type of error that occurred.

onRoomList.description: Triggered when the room list is received from the signalling server. The RoomList expression contains the list of rooms.

connect.display-text: Connect to signalling server at [i]{0}[/i] clientTag [i]{1}[/i]

url.name: URL
url.desc: The URL of the signalling server to connect to.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: Client Tag. Create if not found.

alias.name: Alias
alias.desc: The alias to log in with.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

join-room.description: Join a room on the signalling server.

game.name: Game
game.desc: The name of the game to join.

instance.name: Instance

room.name: Room
room.desc: The name of the room to join.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

max-peers.name: Max Peers
max-peers.desc: The maximum number of peers allowed in the room. Leave 0 to ignore.

auto-join-room.display-text: Join room [i]{2}[/i] Game [i]{0}[/i] Instance [i]{1}[/i] max-peers [i]{4}[/i] locking [i]{5}[/i] clientTag [i]{3}[/i]
auto-join-room.description: Automatically join a room on the signalling server.

room.name: Room

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

max-peers.name: Max Peers
max-peers.desc: The maximum number of peers allowed in the room. Leave 0 to ignore.

locking.name: Locking
locking.desc: If true, the room will be locked to prevent new peers from joining.

sendMessage.display-text: Send message [i]{3}[/i] to peer [i]{0}[/i] tag [i]{1}[/i] clientTag [i]{2}[/i] mode [i]{4}[/i]
sendMessage.description: Send a message to a peer in the room.

peerId.name: Peer ID
peerId.desc: The ID of the peer to send the message to.

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

simulateLatency.description: Set artificial latency, jitter (PDV) and packet loss percentage for network simulation.

pdvMs.name: Jitter (ms)
pdvMs.desc: The packet delay variation (jitter) in milliseconds.

lossPercent.name: Packet loss (%)
lossPercent.desc: The percentage of simulated packet loss.

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: The client tag. Ignored if not found.

broadcastMessage.description: Send a message to a peer in the room.

peerId.desc: The ID of the peer origin. blank to indicate from host.
